dim(A)

## Section 3.3


```{r}
r1 <- matrix(c(1.1,1.1,3.3,1.1), nrow =1)
r2 <- matrix(c(-1.2,3.3,5.4,7.8), nrow =1)
r3 <- matrix(c(1.3,2.2,5.7,3.1), nrow =1)
A <- rbind(r1,r2,r3)
print(A)

b <- r1 <- matrix(c(0.55,2.55,1.28), nrow =3) 
print(b)

print(rref(A))
Rank(A)

B <- A[,c(1,2)]
print(B)

D <- A[,-c(1,2)]
print(D)

GB <- t(B)%*%B
print(GB)

print(-inv(GB)%*%t(B)%*%D)
I <- diag(2)
print(I)

print(rbind(-inv(GB)%*%(t(B)%*%D),I))

N <- rbind(-inv(GB)%*%(t(B)%*%D),I)
print(round(A%*%N,2))
```

## Section 3.5

```{r}
library(far)

v1 <- matrix(c(1,2,3), nrow =3)
v2 <- matrix(c(4,5,6), nrow =3)
v3 <- matrix(c(13,2,-4), nrow =3)
A <- cbind(v1,v2,v3)
print(A)
Rank(A)

OA <- orthonormalization(A)
print(round(OA,2))

Rank(OA)

Norm(OA[,1])

#between column vectors
print(round(t(OA[,1])%*%OA[,2],2))
print(round(t(OA[,1])%*%OA[,3],2))

#between row vectors
print(round(t(OA[1,])%*%OA[2,],2))
print(round(t(OA[1,])%*%OA[3,],2))
```

### Problem 1


```{r}
v1 <- matrix(c(1,2,-3), nrow =3)
v2 <- matrix(c(-4,2,1), nrow =3)
v3 <- matrix(c(-3,4,-2), nrow =3)
A <- cbind(v1,v2,v3)
print(A)
print(rref(A))

B <- A[,c(1,2)]

OB <- orthonormalization(B)
print(round(OB,2))

#basis spanning column space of A
CA <- OB[,c(1,2)]
print(round(CA,2))

#basis spanning left nullspace of A
NAT <- OB[,c(3)]
print(round(NAT,2))

```

### Problem 2

```{r}
r1 <- matrix(c(1,-4,-3,-10,-7), nrow =1)
r2 <- matrix(c(2,2,4,10,6), nrow =1)
r3 <- matrix(c(-3,1,-2,-3,-1), nrow =1)
A <- rbind(r1,r2,r3)
print(A)
print(rref(A))

B <- A[,c(1,2)]

OB <- orthonormalization(B)
print(round(OB,2))

#basis spanning column space of A
CA <- OB[,c(1,2)]
print(round(CA,2))

#basis spanning left nullspace of A
NAT <- OB[,-c(1,2)]
print(round(NAT,2))
```

## Section 4.2

### Problem 1

```{r}
v1 <- matrix(c(1,-1,1), nrow =3)
v2 <- matrix(c(1,3,2), nrow =3)
v3 <- matrix(c(3,5,5), nrow =3)
A <- cbind(v1,v2,v3)
print(A)

b <- matrix(c(1,4,-4))
print(b)

Ab <- cbind(A,b)

Rank(A)
Rank(Ab)

print(rref(A))

B <- A[,c(1,2)]
GB <- t(B)%*%B
xB <- inv(GB)%*%t(B)%*%b
print(xB)

b_hat <- B%*%xB
print(b_hat)

x <- rbind(xB,0)
print(x)

print(round(A%*%x,2))
```
## Section 4.3

### Problem 1

```{r}
r1 <- matrix(c(1,1,2,2,3), nrow =1)
r2 <- matrix(c(-1,3,3,-1,5), nrow =1)
r3 <- matrix(c(1,2,4,3,5), nrow =1)
A <- rbind(r1,r2,r3)

######################################
#STEP 1
######################################
print(A)
print(rref(A))

B<- A[,c(1,2,3)]
D<- A[,-c(1,2,3)]

b <- matrix(c(1,4,-4))
print(b)

GB <- t(B)%*%B
print(GB)

xB <- inv(GB)%*%t(B)%*%b
print(round(xB,2))

x_zero <- rbind(xB[1],xB[2],xB[3],0,0)
print(round(x_zero,2))

Ab <- cbind(A,b)
print(round(rref(Ab),2))


############################################
#STEP 2
############################################

Ab <- cbind(A,b)
print(round(rref(Ab),2))

x4 <- c(-1,1,-1,1,0)
x5 <- c(-1,-2,0,0,1)
x_zero

N <- cbind(x4,x5)
print(N)

# point 1
x_N <- matrix(c(-3,2),nrow=2)
print(x_N)

x_1 <- x_zero - N%*%x_N
print(round(x_1,2))

print(A%*%x_1)


# point 2
x_N <- matrix(c(1,5),nrow=2)
print(x_N)

x_2 <- x_zero - N%*%x_N
print(round(x_2,2))

print(A%*%x_2)
```

## Section 6.2

### Problem 1

```{r}
A <- matrix(c(1,2,-2,-1,-1,-3), 
            nrow=2, byrow = TRUE)

print(A)

S <- diag(svd(A)$d)
print(round(S,2))


U <- svd(A)$u
print(round(U,2))

V <- svd(A)$v
print(round(V,2))


A_inv <- V%*%inv(S)%*%inv(U)
print(round(A_inv,2))

result <- A%*%A_inv
print(round(result,2))

```


### Problem 2

```{r}
A <- matrix(c(1,1,2,1,-1,3), 
            nrow=2, byrow = TRUE)

print(A)

S <- diag(svd(A)$d)
print(round(S,2))


U <- svd(A)$u
print(round(U,2))

V <- svd(A)$v
print(round(V,2))


A_inv <- V%*%inv(S)%*%inv(U)
print(round(A_inv,2))

result <- A%*%A_inv
print(round(result,2))

```

## Section 6.4

```{r}
A <- matrix(c(1,2,3,4,5,
              0.2,0.8,0.7,1.1,1.7), 
              nrow=2, byrow = TRUE)

print(A)

S <- diag(svd(A)$d)
print(round(S,2))


U <- svd(A)$u
print(round(U,2))

V <- svd(A)$v
print(round(V,2))

T1 <- t(A)%*%U
print(round(T1,2))

```
